sequence:
My Sister's Growth Spurt?!

<size=45>Chapter 1: My Sister's Daily Routine</size>

scripts.say: Commander, wanna come over to play this weekend?
One day, I suddenly received an invitation from Vincennes. That weekend, I found myself in front of the gates to the Union's dorm...
Port - Eagle Union Dorms
Ah, Commander, you made it. Vincennes told me you were on your way.
Vincennes, wake up! Weren't you the one who invited Commander over to play?
I stepped inside the dorm and saw Vincennes, sound asleep in Quincy's lap.
Zzzz.... huh? Ugh... five more minutes...
It's not good to keep to keep people waiting for you...
Then... Commander should come take a nap too... zzz...
Vincennes fell asleep again, mid sentence.
I'm sorry, Commander, Vincennes is just always like this...
That reminds me, how is Vincennes doing as your secretary? She didn't make any trouble for you, did she?
Her personality is a bit too laid back... perhaps we've spoiled her too much...
Being like this at home is one thing, but I'm worried that she's like this on the job as well... If it's troublesome for you, then...
You can always let me take her place!
Is there no option to help her become more reliable?

options.content: "Though, Vincennes is fine as she is"

scripts.say: I, I see... I'm relieved if that is the case, Commander.
Zzz... Sis... you're being noisy...
Hehe... sorry, sorry. Um, Commander, should we all take a nap then?
Just as I was thinking about where I would even be able to lie down, Quincy smiled at me and gently patted her unoccupied leg.
I didn't dare take her up on her offer, but I did sit down next to Vincennes for a while until she woke up.
